A '''nervous male passenger''' sat next to [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] on her flight to Paris in "[[The Last One, Part 2]]". He was portrayed by [[Jim Rash]].

When Rachel gets a phone call from [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] claiming there is something wrong with the plane's left phalange, he makes a commotion, causing the other passengers to follow suit and get off the plane as well. His actions delay the plane long enough for Ross to reach Rachel in time and profess his love for her. The nervous male passenger is last seen dubiously boarding the plane as [[Ross Geller|Ross]] speaks privately with Rachel.
